wikipedia_page.main: Elise Andrew (born 1989) is a British blogger and science communicator. She was the CEO and founder of "I fucking love science" (IFLS), a website and Facebook page on popular science. With regard to the site, Andrew has come under criticism for plagiarism, unlicensed use of intellectual property, reporting false and misleading information, and rarely issuing corrections.The IFLS website was purchased by LabX Media Group in 2020, according to the LabX website.
